amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 108-561 to direct the Inspector General of the Central Intelligence Agency to audit the evidence of the relationship, existing prior to September 11, 2001, between the regime of Saddam Hussein and al-Qaeda, referenced in all intelligence reporting, including products, briefings, and memoranda, distributed by the Central Intelligence Agency to the White House and Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 343 - 76 (Roll no. 295).
